name: Through the Grinder
description:
This is my first ever game jam, so please go easy on me! I ran out of time before I could add a lot of the features I wanted, and I'm really bummed about no music being in there. I wanna thank Kenney and LimeZu for making some free assets I used, they rock!

There is currently a bug that if you don't kill many people in a wave, the next wave won't spawn.

Use the WASD to move and the mouse to aim and shoot.

Go by the cash register to buy towers.

You have limited ammo, but can reload by going to the table in the top-right.

Towers will have limited ammo as well, so you must refill them with your own ammo supply. (There's currently no animation to show this, so you'll have to be attentive.)
